QuestData.Title: To Dinah, at Once!
QuestData.Description: The Horde may have never known one more loyal than Gorat. He never failed to complete a mission, and it would seem that he refuses to allow this to be his first.$b$bGorat had you deliver this vial for a purpose. Dinah is the daughter of a revered shaman, and is more powerful than she appears. Bring her the vial and hope that we are not too late.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kadrak wants you to bring the Vial of Gorat's Blood to Dinah at Mor'shan Ramparts.
